channel.title: Typescript on Gal.E
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Gal.E

item.title: Create and Publish Your First CLI Using Typescript
item.description: Following my previous blog post 5 Cli Tools That Will Increase Your Dev Velocity And Code Quality I wrote a quick guide on how to write and publish a CLI. What’s in it for you? Write a cool as f*** CLI tool. Learn how to set up a project using Typescript. Publish your new shiny CLI to npm. setup We will use Scaffolder to generate all the boilerplate we need for our shiny CLI.
